nodes.text: Gilgam was a MandalMotors Pursuer-class enforcement ship employed by K'Armyn Viraxo in a mercenary role to intimidate business rivals and defend Viraxo interests against pirates.

While conducting a hit-and-fade attack against the Harlequin Station trading post, the Gilgam and its sister ship, the Enkidu, were driven off by an unexpectedly aggressive Ace Azzameen piloting his family's YT-1300 Corellian light freighter, the Sabra.
Unlike its sister ship, Enkidu, which continued to harass the Azzameens up to the day of its destruction, the Gilgam is not known to have participated in any further raids against the Azzameens.
